title: Emerald Kundan Kangan - A Touch of Royal Elegance
materials: accented with meticulously set Kundan stones. Exact gemstone weight: 2.30 carats (total for two Emeralds). Gross weight: 44.760 grams; Gold weight: 4.12 grams.
features: This stunning Kangan features a classic Kundan setting, showcasing vibrant pear-shaped Emeralds. The intricate goldwork creates a mesmerizing display of light and color. The openable design ensures a comfortable and secure fit. It blends traditional craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic.
occasions: or as a statement piece for a special occasion. Adds a regal touch to any traditional South Indian attire.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans, this Kangan is a testament to timeless elegance. The vibrant Emeralds symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom. The Kundan setting, a hallmark of South Indian jewelry, adds unparalleled sparkle and grandeur. A true investment in enduring style.
